SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
 
AdminActivity
Launched after the user chooses to continue as an Admin.
AllUser
This object displays a list of all users registered with a particular event inside a fragment.
AllUserAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter to display a list of users and their event status.
AllUserModel
Model class representing a user with a name and status.
AttendeeHomeActivity
The AttendeeHomeActivity class is responsible for displaying the attendee home screen, where users can view a list of events, scan QR codes, and access their profiles.
AttendeeHomeFragment
 
AttendeeMyEvent
AttendeeMyEvent class displays the "My Events" screen for attendees, where they can navigate through various event-related tabs using a ViewPager2 and a TabLayout.
AttendeeProfile
The AttendeeProfile activity allows users to view and edit their profile information, including name, email, phone, and profile picture, which are retrieved from Firebase.
ConfirmedEvents
A Fragment that displays a list of confirmed events fetched from Firebase Firestore.
ConfirmedUser
Fragment that displays confirmed users for a given event.
DeclinedEvents
A Fragment that displays a list of declined events fetched from Firebase Firestore.
DeclinedUser
Fragment that displays declined users for a given event.
Entrant
 
EntrantList
EntrantList class manages the list of all entrants to an event, categorized by status.
Event
This event model class holds essential information about a given event referenced with primary key eventID(id).
Event.OnUrlFetchedListener
Interface for listening to the URL fetch result from Firebase Storage.
EventAdapter
Custom adapter for displaying event data in a ListView.
EventDetails
Activity that displays detailed information about a specific event.
EventItem
Event Item is used to display a certain Item picked from a ListView of events
EventTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FacilitiesFragment
A fragment used to display and manage facilities on the app.
Facility
 
FacilityList
Manages a list of Facility objects, allowing for the addition and removal of facilities.
HomeFragment
Used to display the Home page for Admins.
ImageAdapter
Overrides RecyclerView class in order to display images as List elements
ImageAdapter.ViewHolder
Adds delete button and ImageView to ViewHolder Object
ImagesFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
ImageUploadFragment
A fragment that handles the uploading of event images and related data to Firestore.
InvitedAdapter
This adapter extends ArrayAdapter to display the invited participants.
InvitedUser
This fragment displays a ListView containing invited participants.
Lottery
Lottery class handles the lottery selection process for entrants.
MainActivity
The main entry point of the application.
MainActivity.TokenCallback
 
MapActivity
This activity is used to view a map containing the locations of different participants that have signed up for a given eventID.
NewEventForm
Activity for creating or editing a new event.
Organizer
 
OrganizerFacility
This object creates a Fragment for displaying, editing, adding, or deleting different facilities that belong to an organizer with given deviceID.
OrganizerHomeActivity
This activity represents the home screen for the organizer, featuring a bottom navigation bar to navigate between different fragments.
OrganizerHomeFragment
This fragment displays a list of events organized by the user (organizer).
OrganizerProfile
This fragment displays the organizer's profile, allowing them to view and edit their information.
Participant
Participant Model class is used to contain essential information about participants of an event.
PendingEvents
This fragment displays a list of pending events for the organizer.
ProfileFragment
A simple Fragment subclass.
QRCode
The QRCode class stores a unique QR code associated with an event.
ReceivingNotifications
This object extends FirebaseMessagingService in order to deliver notifications to a user.
ScanQR
This activity allows the user to scan QR codes to fetch event details from Firestore.
SplashActivity
Splashscreen object for a startup animation executed during runtime
TabbedDialogFragment
This DialogFragment shows different tabs for displaying confirmed, invited, declined, or all user fragments.
TestUS01
This class tests the functionality of the Attendee (entrant) related to joining and leaving waiting lists, updating profile information, and handling notifications.
TestUS02
 
User
 
UsersFragment
 
UsersListAdapter
 
ViewPageAdapter
This class is an adapter for managing the fragments in a ViewPager2 widget.
WaitingList
